original: Bergling, Johan Albert, byggnadsingenjör, Skara, f. 11/12/76 i Tjällmo, östergötl. 1., av Svante Otto B. o. Johanna Samuelsson. G. 08 m. Valborg Larsson. Barn: Eva f. 11, Svante 17. — Stud. v. Norrköp. tekn. elem:sk. samt byggn :yrkessk. i Sthlm. Anst. å arkit:kont. i Sthlm 06-08, arb :led. v. uppför, av Ulricehamns vintersanat. 09-10, av fabr. o. bostäder v. A-B Primus i Sthlm 10-14, av Skarab. läns tuberk :sjukh. i Axvall 14-16, kontr. v. uppför, av museum o. slakthus i Skara 16-18, uppf. till- o. ombyggn. av lantmannask. i Skara 16-18, egen byggn :verksamh. för bl. a. Skarab. Ensk. Bank i Skara, Lidköp. m. fl., kontr. o. tillsyn, v. åtskill. byggn:fö-ret., bl. a. ombyggn. av länsresid. o. landstingsbyggn. i Mariestad, ny-byggn. f. Skara semin., utf. Skara brandstat., nybyggn. f. hush :sällsk. i Skara, Egneilska stift, i Skövde m. m. Ordf. i brandstyr. fr. 27, led. av drät^ selkamm. 26-32, byggn :ndn fr. 29, ordf. där sed. 43, led. av stadsfullm. (h.) 31-46, folksk:styr., lokalstyr. f. lärov., huvudm. i Skarab. Läns Sparb., styr:led. i Skarab. läns stadshyp:-fören. Res-or t. Danm., Tyskl., Engl. o. Frankr.
translated: Bergling, Johan Albert, building engineer, Skara, born December 11, 1876 in Tjällmo, Östergötland, son of Svante Otto B. and Johanna Samuelsson. Married in 1908 to Valborg Larsson. Children: Eva born in 1911, Svante born in 1917. Studied at Norrköping Technical School and Building Trade School in Stockholm. Employed at architectural firm in Stockholm from 1906-1908, construction supervisor for Ulricehamns Winter Sanatorium from 1909-1910, for factories and residences at A-B Primus in Stockholm from 1910-1914, for Skaraborg County Tuberculosis Hospital in Axvall from 1914-1916, contractor for construction of museums and slaughterhouses in Skara from 1916-1918, construction and renovation of Farmers' School in Skara from 1916-1918, engaged in own construction business for Skaraborgs Enskilda Bank in Skara, Lidköping, and other places, contracted and supervised various building projects including renovation of County Residence and County Council Building in Mariestad, new construction for Skara Seminary, Skara Fire Station, new building for the Household Association in Skara, the Egneilska Foundation in Skövde, among others. Chairman of the fire brigade from 1927, member of the city council from 1931-1946, school board, local government for schools, head manager of Skaraborg County Savings Bank, board member of Skaraborg County Housing Association. Traveled to Denmark, Germany, England and France.
